name: Buggy's Day
description:
Buggy’s Day is a prototype RPG game where you play as Buggy, a happy, seemingly normal, and little ladybug rabbit girl! She lives in a forest with her mother and her many friends. Dive into a peek of what her home and daily life are like - with some added mysteries! 

Note: The following version is a demo/prototype version and not fully complete. Please enjoy.
